text: Carlowrightia is a genus of flowering plants in the bear's breeches family, Acanthaceae. Members of the genus, commonly known as wrightworts, are mainly small shrubs bearing inflorescences of lily-like flowers. They are native to the Americas, with many species found in western North America. The genus was named for the American botanist Charles Wright. ==Selected species== * Carlowrightia arizonica A.Gray - Arizona wrightwort * Carlowrightia cordifolia A.Gray * Carlowrightia ecuadoriana T.F.Daniel & Wassh. * Carlowrightia fuertensis * Carlowrightia henricksonii T.F.Daniel * Carlowrightia linearifolia (Torr.)
